version_description:
Introducing the Female Pelvis model!
With the addition of the female pelvis and urogenital system to Complete Anatomy for iPhone, the first step towards creating the world’s most accurate and detailed female anatomical model is here.

The femal

Essential Anatomy 5 users now get a discount when they upgrade to the full version of Complete Anatomy. Welcome to the community!
Minor fixes and bugs squashed.

Improved interface for a smoother experience
Search for Bone Parts and Surfaces
Clearer filtering in Library, including male/female filter
Bug fixes and behind-the-scenes optimization

Improved zooming interaction: the model now adjusts its position to keep your selected structure in view.
Improved menu in landscape mode.
Now even quicker to filter inside Library - get the anatomy you need fast!

* Lecture progress now saved across devices, log in and out without losing your progress
* Take more control over your privacy settings with updated options
* Search Questions more easily with behind-the-scenes improvements
* Bug fixes and under-

The platform’s biggest update yet allows you to:
- Dive into 8 intricate new micro-models! Explore the Alveoli, Internal Muscle, Muscle fibre, Lymph Node, Bone Tissue, Blood Vessels, Peripheral Nerve and Skin at microscopic scale.
- Study a living,
The On-boarding and Purchasing experiences have been improved.

Get what you need, quicker!
Not only is Search more responsive and 5x faster, you can now search Videos.

Enjoy a brand new, easy-to-use interface, with significant improvements for your user experience. We hope you love it!

Also includes:
- Further optimization so the app runs more smoothly
- Dr. Chrono integration
Bugs fixed and user experience further improved.

- Portrait mode: Now choose to view your Screens in portrait or landscape mode
- Branch feature: Follow the course of an artery or nerve with the new Branches feature
- Settings: Customize your workspace with all-new Settings options
- Search: Ne
Improved video listings so you see more relevant results when selecting a structure.
We’ve adjusted some major nuts and bolts under the hood to bring you a superior, optimized experience.

*New gross anatomy model*
Introducing the all-new, female thorax prosection with world-leading accuracy. Explore the anatomy of the mammary gland and breast tissue, including a representation of the superficial thoracic fascia, which houses the breast
Issue where the model sometimes rotates off-axis has been resolved.
Some minor bug-fixes and UX improvements.

Introducing Complete Anatomy 2020 - more content, new features, improved experience.

* Improved User Experience *
Enjoy a huge experience update, with an easier-to-use interface, including your own centralized hub for easy access to all areas o

Introducing Complete Anatomy 2020 - more content, new features, improved experience.
* Improved User Experience *
Enjoy a huge experience update, with an easier-to-use interface, including your own centralized hub for easy access to all areas of the

- Cross-sections are now viewed from the inferior position, as commonly read in scan data.
- Some issues with results not appearing in Curriculum Manager Dashboard fixed.
- Now compatible with iOS 13.
Some fixes for iOS 13 and under the hood improvements

Shaving seconds off your busy study schedule - get logged in quicker with autocomplete.
If your institution is using Complete Anatomy, check out your new customized Hub.
After some tightening of nuts and bolts, you’ll find a smoother experience insi

- Now download videos from your Library for offline use
- New Courses added to the platform including:
* Male Urologic Disorders
* Emergency Medicine & Trauma
- Micromodel updates:
* Peripheral nerve, improved accuracy of

- Introducing Cell Biology to the platform! Premium customers can dive into this new collection with our Sperm and Oocyte models, educationally enhanced to allow students to explore and compare the male reproductive cell and its female counterpart.
The problem on start for some devices has been addressed.

- Fixed a bug which prevented some videos from displaying
- Minor fixes in AR mode
- Under the hood improvements
- Bug fix: Videos contained in Lectures are now successfully playing

- Crash fixes
- Improvement to Cut tool
- Bug fixes and overall improvements

-Now only see relevant filter tags for videos

-Bug fixes and overall improvements
Under the hood improvements and bug fixes

- Some improvements to navigation across all groups and resources
- Under the hood improvements and fixes

Updated for the new academic year with amazing new features and content!
- New Head & Neck region with incredible detail and unrivalled accuracy 
- Amazing new content for Dentistry
- New micromodels of cochlea, scalp, retinal layers
Fixed issue where model in certain Screens displayed incorrect structures

-Clearer indicators to describe in which group content is stored in your Atlas
-Access your subscription details more easily in My Account
-Improved behaviour & feedback during video upload/conversion process
-Under-the-hoods improvements

-Refinements to Sutures and Craniometrics for the skull
-Quicker Lecture saving for Educators
-Improved Quiz result reporting in Curriculum Manager Dashboard
-Range of improvements and bug fixes behind the scenes
